type: Office Furniture Installation or Reconfiguration Service
short_summary: Office fit-up project for Shared Services Canada (SSC) in Barrie, Ontario.
description: Amendment to Closing Time: The submission deadline is September 19, 2023 2:00 PM EDT, for Phase 2 of the office fit-up project.
duration_in_months: The Contract includes all products, labour, equipment, removal and installation as required or implied by the drawings and specifications to complete the Work, for a period of 52 weeks
full_summary:
**New Office Fit-Up – Shared Services Canada, Barrie, Ontario**
=============================================

**Reference Information**
------------------------

*   Reference Number: WS4056962109-Doc4157548338
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Solicitation Number: WS4056962109
*   Publication Date: August 21, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: September 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Tender Overview**
-------------------

This public tender announcement pertains to a request for a second phase of a two-phase solicitation process for the fit-up of Shared Services Canada offices in Barrie, Ontario. The first phase of the solicitation evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers, and the current phase invites qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid for the project. The engagement is expected to commence within 52 weeks from the date of notification of contract acceptance.

**Project Details**
-------------------

*   UNSPSC Category: Office Furniture Installation or Reconfiguration Service (72153606)
*   Project Description: The required work includes the installation, reconfiguration, and removal of office furniture under the specifications and drawings outlined in the tender documents.
*   Trade Agreements: Bidders are expected to comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) regulations.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   Tender Method: Open Bidding (Competitive)
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services
*   Contract Period: 52 weeks from the acceptance of the offer

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Time-Allowed Bidder
    *   Essa, Zobia (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Email: zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

*   Visiting the contact information on the notice will redirect eligible, responsive vendors to the required bid submission portal.
*   The bidding process and submission requirements are detailed in the associated tender documents. Interested and eligible bidders should ensure compliance with all instructions and requirements to secure their application.  Bidders are expected to submit their bid on or before September 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
